A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Basically rejects the loose threads set up by TFA.  Got into a heated debate on FB on this\, with someone seeing it as a refreshing direction\, while I saw it as lazy story-telling\, and ruining several arcs\, not to mention removing/ruining character development.  Disappointed\, but perhaps the new direction Star Wars is taking isn't for fans like me anymore.
